meanings.sent1: The small plant in the garden is semishrubby, with a mix of woody and herbaceous features.
meanings.sent2: The semishrubby bushes along the path provide a nice blend of greenery.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a semishrubby plant could look so cute with its mix of bushy and leafy parts.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was like a semishrubby paradise, a harmonious blend of shrubs and herbs.
meanings.sent5: The semishrubby landscape was a unique sight, with its mix of bushy and leafy textures.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics of both shrubs and herbs.
meanings.sent1: The semishrubby garden was a delightful mix of bushy and leafy plants.
meanings.sent2: The semishrubby area of the park was a lovely combination of shrubs and herbs.
meanings.sent3: The semishrubby plant in the pot seemed unsure if it wanted to be a shrub or an herb.
meanings.sent4: Herbal tea with a hint of shrubby flavor was like a semishrubby potion.
meanings.sent5: The semishrubby bouquet of flowers brought a unique blend of scents to the room.
